title: Wire loops coaxial with a current carrying wire

content.prompt: The two circular wire loops represented above are coaxial. If the current I in loop A is increasing linearly with respect to time, which of the following is true of the induced current in loop B ?

choices.label: It is in the same direction as that in loop A and also increasing with respect to time.
It is in the opposite direction of that in loop A and also increasing with respect to time.
It is in the same direction as that in loop A and constant with respect to time.
It is in the opposite direction of that in loop A and constant with respect to time.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
